title: Server Administration
content:
#

Welcome to the L4D2 Server Administration Guide! This section contains technical
content for server administrators and advanced users.


ğŸ“š Content Categories#


ğŸ–¥ï¸ Server Setup#

 * Server Setup Tutorial - Build L4D2 server from scratch
 * System Requirements - Hardware and software requirements
 * Network Configuration - Port configuration and firewall settings


âš™ï¸ Server Configuration#

 * Basic Configuration - Basic server parameter configuration
 * Game Mode Configuration - Configuration methods for different game modes
 * Plugin Management - SourceMod and MetaMod plugin management


ğŸ”§ Advanced Management#

 * Admin Commands - Common commands for server administrators
 * Automation Scripts - Server maintenance automation scripts
 * Monitoring and Logging - Server performance monitoring and log analysis


ğŸ›¡ï¸ Security Protection#

 * Anti-Cheat Configuration - VAC and third-party anti-cheat systems
 * User Management - User permissions and ban management
 * Security Best Practices - Server security protection guide


ğŸ·ï¸ Tags#

server-setup configuration plugin-development automation security
performance-optimization troubleshooting linux windows sourcemod metamod


ğŸ’¡ Usage Instructions#

This section is primarily for:

 * Players who want to build their own servers
 * Server administrators and operations personnel
 * Plugin developers and advanced users
 * Players interested in server technology

If you're a regular player, check out the Find Servers section.


ğŸš€ Quick Start#

If you're setting up an L4D2 server for the first time, follow this learning
order:

 1. System Requirements - Understand hardware and software needs
 2. Server Setup Tutorial - Follow detailed steps to build the server
 3. Basic Configuration - Configure basic server parameters
 4. Admin Commands - Learn common management commands

Start your server administration journey!

title: L4D Resources
content:
#

Welcome to L4D Resources! This is the most professional Left 4 Dead 2 resource
website, providing players with comprehensive mod recommendations, map guides,
server lists, and gaming resources.


ğŸ® Website Features#

 * Ad-Free Experience - Clean information browsing environment
 * Comprehensive Coverage - From beginner guides to advanced techniques
 * Real-Time Updates - Continuously updated with latest game content
 * Community Driven - Welcome player contributions


ğŸ“š Main Content#


ğŸ”§ Mods#

 * Model Mods: Character, weapon, and environment enhancements
 * Script Mods: Gameplay enhancements and utility tools
 * Audio & Visual: Sound packs and visual effects
 * Essential Mods: Top recommendations and beginner-friendly


ğŸ—ºï¸ Maps#

 * Official Maps: Complete official campaigns and DLC
 * Third-Party Maps: Community featured and custom campaigns
 * Popular Recommendations: Beginner-friendly and challenging maps
 * Map Guides: Completion tips and hidden elements


ğŸ® Find Servers#

 * Vanilla Servers: Official and mod-free experience
 * Versus Servers: Competitive and casual versus modes
 * RPG Servers: Character growth and equipment systems
 * Server Guide: Connection methods and selection advice


ğŸ–¥ï¸ Server Admin#

 * Server Setup: Build servers from scratch tutorials
 * Server Configuration: Basic and advanced configuration guides
 * Advanced Management: Admin commands and automation scripts
 * Security Protection: Anti-cheat and user management


ğŸŒŸ Quick Start#

If you're new to L4D2, we recommend starting with:

 1. Introduction - Understand basic game concepts
 2. Basic Controls - Master basic operations
 3. Survival Tips - Learn survival essentials
 4. Teamwork - Improve team collaboration


ğŸ¤ Contributing#

This website is open source, and we welcome all L4D2 players to contribute:

 * ğŸ“ Submit content updates
 * ğŸ› Report incorrect information
 * ğŸ’¡ Suggest improvements
 * ğŸŒ Assist with translations


ğŸ“ Contact Us#

For any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us through:

 * GitHub Issues
 * Community Forums
 * Discord Server

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This website is dedicated to providing the highest quality gaming resources for
L4D2 players. Let's survive together in the apocalyptic world!

title: Maps
content:
#

Welcome to the L4D2 Maps Resource Library! Here you'll find information about
official maps, DLC maps, and quality third-party maps.


ğŸ“š Content Categories#


ğŸ¢ Official Maps#

 * Dead Center - Savannah city center, beginner-friendly
 * Dark Carnival - Horror amusement park
 * Swamp Fever - Louisiana bayou adventure
 * Hard Rain - Storm survival challenge
 * The Parish - New Orleans escape


ğŸ® DLC Maps#

 * The Passing - Meeting with L4D1 survivors
 * The Sacrifice - Heroes' final battle
 * No Mercy - Classic hospital map
 * Crash Course - Fast-paced short map


ğŸŒŸ Third-Party Maps#

 * Community Featured Maps - Quality player-made maps
 * Custom Campaign Maps - Original storyline campaigns
 * Remake Maps - Modern remakes of classic maps
 * Experimental Maps - Innovative gameplay maps


ğŸ† Popular Recommendations#

 * Beginner Maps - Maps suitable for practice
 * Challenging Maps - High-difficulty recommendations
 * Cooperative Maps - Teamwork-focused maps
 * Versus Maps - Maps suitable for versus mode


ğŸ·ï¸ Tags#

official-maps dlc-maps third-party-maps beginner-friendly high-difficulty
teamwork versus-mode workshop map-guides hidden-elements


ğŸ’¡ Map Selection Guide#


New Players#

 * Start with Dead Center to familiarize with game mechanics
 * Choose maps marked as "beginner-friendly"
 * Experience official maps first, then try third-party content


Advanced Players#

 * Challenge high-difficulty third-party maps
 * Try innovative maps with different styles and mechanics
 * Participate in community map testing and feedback


ğŸ” Map Information#

Each map page includes:

 * Basic Info: Map name, author, release date
 * Difficulty Rating: Beginner/Normal/Hard/Expert
 * Game Modes: Supported game modes
 * Special Features: Unique mechanics or highlights
 * Strategy Tips: Completion tips and important notes
 * Download Links: Steam Workshop or other download sources


âš ï¸ Important Notes#

 * Third-party maps need to be downloaded from Steam Workshop or other sources
 * Some maps may require specific plugins or mod support
 * Ensure all players have the same maps installed for multiplayer
 * Check for map updates regularly for the best experience

Start exploring the world of L4D2 maps!

title: Mod Recommendations
content:
#

Welcome to the L4D2 Mod Recommendations! Discover the best mods to enhance your
gaming experience.


ğŸ“š Content Categories#


ğŸ¨ Model Mods#

 * Character Models - Custom survivor and infected models
 * Weapon Models - Enhanced weapon appearances and animations
 * Environment Models - Map objects and environmental improvements


ğŸ“œ Script Mods#

 * Gameplay Scripts - Mods that change game mechanics
 * UI Enhancement Scripts - Interface and HUD improvements
 * Utility Scripts - Quality of life improvements


ğŸµ Audio & Visual Mods#

 * Sound Packs - Custom sound effects and music
 * Visual Effects - Enhanced graphics and particle effects
 * Lighting Mods - Improved lighting and atmosphere


ğŸ› ï¸ Essential Mods#

 * Must-Have Mods - Top recommended mods for all players
 * Beginner Friendly - Easy-to-install mods for newcomers
 * Competitive Mods - Mods for competitive gameplay


ğŸ·ï¸ Tags#

character-models weapon-skins sound-packs gameplay-enhancement ui-improvement
visual-effects workshop installation-guide compatibility performance


ğŸ’¡ Installation Guide#


Steam Workshop#

 1. Subscribe to mods on Steam Workshop
 2. Launch L4D2 and enable mods in Add-ons menu
 3. Restart the game to apply changes


Manual Installation#

 1. Download mod files from trusted sources
 2. Extract to appropriate L4D2 directories
 3. Follow mod-specific installation instructions


ğŸ” How to Choose Mods#

 * Compatibility: Check mod compatibility with your game version
 * Performance: Consider impact on game performance
 * Reviews: Read user reviews and ratings
 * Updates: Choose actively maintained mods


âš ï¸ Important Notes#

 * Always backup your game files before installing mods
 * Some mods may not work in multiplayer or competitive modes
 * Disable conflicting mods to avoid issues
 * Keep mods updated for best performance

Start exploring the amazing world of L4D2 mods!

title: Find Servers
content:
#

Welcome to the L4D2 Find Servers Guide! Here you'll find recommendations for
various types of quality servers to help you find the perfect gaming experience.


ğŸ“š Server Categories#


ğŸ¯ Vanilla Servers#

 * Official Servers List - Valve-maintained standard servers
 * Pure Community Servers - Mod-free original game experience
 * Beginner-Friendly Servers - Servers suitable for practice


âš”ï¸ Versus Servers#

 * Competitive Versus Servers - High-level versus mode
 * Casual Versus Servers - Relaxed versus gaming
 * Custom Versus Servers - Special rule versus modes


ğŸ® RPG Servers#

 * Role-Playing Servers - Game modes with RPG elements
 * Leveling System Servers - Character growth and skill systems
 * Equipment Enhancement Servers - Weapon and equipment upgrade systems


ğŸ·ï¸ Tags#

vanilla-servers versus-mode rpg-system beginner-friendly competitive
casual-gaming custom-mods english-servers international-servers low-latency


ğŸ” How to Choose Servers#


Based on Skill Level#

 * New Players: Choose beginner-friendly or casual servers
 * Intermediate Players: Try competitive versus or RPG servers
 * Expert Players: Challenge high-difficulty or tournament servers


Based on Gaming Preferences#

 * Love Original Experience: Choose vanilla servers
 * Love Competitive Play: Choose versus mode servers
 * Love Character Growth: Choose RPG system servers


Based on Geographic Location#

 * Regional Players: Prioritize nearby servers for lower latency
 * International Players: Choose servers in your region


ğŸ“Š Server Information#

Each server page includes:

 * Server Name: Display name of the server
 * IP Address: Connection address and port
 * Game Modes: Supported game modes
 * Player Count: Current online/maximum players
 * Latency Info: Latency reference for different regions
 * Special Features: Unique features or mods of the server
 * Management Quality: Admin activity and server stability


ğŸ’¡ Connecting to Servers#


Through In-Game Browser#

 1. Launch L4D2
 2. Select "Find Game"
 3. Choose "Server Browser"
 4. Filter and search servers
 5. Double-click to join server


Through Console#

 1. Press ~ key to open console
 2. Type connect [Server IP:Port]
 3. Press Enter to connect


Through Favorites#

 1. Right-click server in server browser
 2. Select "Add to Favorites"
 3. Quickly find in favorites next time


âš ï¸ Important Notes#

 * Some servers may require specific mods or plugins
 * Pay attention to server rules to avoid violations
 * Choose servers with lower latency for better experience
 * Contact server administrators if you encounter issues


ğŸŒŸ Recommended Servers#


Recently Added Servers#

 * More servers being added continuously...


Popular Server Rankings#

 1. Vanilla Servers - Most popular original experience
 2. Versus Servers - Competitive players' choice
 3. RPG Servers - Paradise for character growth enthusiasts


ğŸ“ Server Administrators#


Want to add your server?#

If you're a server administrator, welcome to add your quality server to our
list!

ğŸ‘‰ View Server Submission Guide


Submission Benefits#

 * âœ… Increase server exposure
 * âœ… Attract more quality players
 * âœ… Join official recommendation list
 * âœ… Gain community recognition

Start finding your ideal server!

title: Server Submission Guide
content:
#

Welcome server administrators to add your quality servers to our list!


ğŸ“‹ Submission Requirements#


Basic Requirements#

 * âœ… Server must run stably (uptime > 90%)
 * âœ… Provide accurate connection information
 * âœ… Follow community behavior guidelines
 * âœ… Have active administrators
 * âœ… Maintain good gaming environment


Technical Requirements#

 * âœ… Server version is latest or compatible
 * âœ… Stable network connection with reasonable latency
 * âœ… Comprehensive anti-cheat measures
 * âœ… Regular maintenance and updates


ğŸš€ Submission Process#


Step 1: Prepare Server Information#

Collect the following essential information:

 * Server name and description
 * IP address and port
 * Server type (Vanilla/Versus/RPG)
 * Geographic location
 * Administrator contact information
 * Server features and rules


Step 2: Choose Submission Method#

Method 1: GitHub Pull Request (Recommended)#

 1. Fork this project repository
 2. Create server page in appropriate directory
 3. Fill in server information using template
 4. Submit Pull Request
 5. Wait for review and merge

Method 2: Contact Administrator#

 1. Join official Discord: discord.gg/l4d2wiki
 2. Contact group administrator to submit server info
 3. Provide complete server documentation
 4. Wait for review and addition


Step 3: Review Process#

 1. Information Verification - Verify basic server information
 2. Connection Testing - Test server connection and stability
 3. Content Review - Check server content and rules
 4. Community Feedback - Collect community opinions
 5. Final Decision - Decide whether to include


ğŸ“ Page Templates#


Vanilla Server Template#

- **Region**:

- **Uptime**: 24/7

2. Rule 2

## ğŸ‘¥ Contact Info

Versus Server Template#

- **IP Address**: `IP:Port`
- **Max Players**: 8 (4v4)

## ğŸ® Versus Rules
### Basic Rules
- 4v4 versus mode
- Take turns playing roles

## ğŸ† Skill Requirements
- **Recommended Level**: Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced

1. No cheating
2. Respect opponents



RPG Server Template#

## ğŸ“Š Basic Information
- **RPG Type**: Roleplay/Leveling/Equipment
- **IP Address**: `IP:Port`
- **Save System**: Yes/No

## ğŸ® RPG System Introduction
### Character System
- **Level Cap**: 
- **Attribute Points**:

### Equipment System

- **Equipment Quality**: 

## ğŸ† Game Features
- âœ… Character Growth
- âœ… Equipment Collection



âš ï¸ Important Notes#


Prohibited Server Types#

 * âŒ Servers with malicious content
 * âŒ Frequently crashing or unstable servers
 * âŒ Servers violating game rules
 * âŒ Servers with cheats or hacks
 * âŒ Poorly managed servers


Server Maintenance Requirements#

 * Regularly update server status
 * Handle player feedback promptly
 * Maintain stable server operation
 * Follow community standards


Removal Conditions#

 * Long-term offline (over 30 days)
 * Serious violations
 * Too many player complaints
 * No longer maintained or updated


ğŸ“ Contact Us#


Official Contact#

 * Discord: discord.gg/l4d2wiki
 * Email: admin@l4d2wiki.com
 * GitHub: github.com/b9348/l4d2


FAQ#

 * Q: How long after submission to see results? A: Usually 3-7 business days for
   review completion

 * Q: Can server information be modified? A: Yes, please contact administrator
   or submit new PR

 * Q: Why was my server rejected? A: Please check rejection reasons, improve and
   resubmit

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you for contributing quality servers to the L4D2 community! ğŸ®
